Package com.jme.input

Class AWTKeyInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.input.AWTInput
      • com.jme.input.AWTKeyInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme.input.Input, com.jme.input.KeyInput, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
    public class AWTKeyInput
extends AWTInput
implements com.jme.input.KeyInput, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    The implementation of the KeyInput dedicated to AWT component.

    This class is based on the JavaFX original code provided by Alexander Brui (see JME3-FX)

    Author:
    Julien Seinturier - COMEX SA - http://www.seinturier.fr, Alexander Brui (JavaSaBr)
